partnerDetails.about:
DilMotion Control Ltd ('DMC') was set up to assist companies within the UK & Irish market who have exposure to the ELAU PacDrive product range. With over 20 years' experience, we are now trusted by 100+ international companies (including FTSE 100) who rely on us for all their ELAU PacDrive support.
 
With a team of world class technicians, ex-ELAU / Schneider engineer, a strong network within Schneider, and first-class logistics, means we can attend breakdowns within 24 hours, delivery critical spares & loans on the SAME DAY and much more.
 
Whether its programming with CoDySys IEC 61131-3, labelling and flow-wrapper applications, robotics with Vision Systems or a Multi Axis Servo machine, we can always help: Breakdown, Repair, Training, Programming, Machine Analytics, Loans, Spares & Parts.
